w: and may He make his throne
at the expense of his life
but the panels [of the stands] were
as well as for the doors
Hadad and his men set out
but the man of God went back
[the man of God] had finished eating
As he went on his way
who will receive a proper burial
they provoked Him to jealous anger
and to provoke Me to anger
and at the cost of Segub
so that we may eat it
who has opened her home to me
Perhaps he is deep in thought
and they did it a second time
and they did it a third time
were looking for a sign of hope
and Ahab had him come up
So you have found me out
through whom we can inquire of
